title: Decontamination of a genome assembly
questions: How to remove contaminant sequences from your assembly?
objectives: Remove contaminant sequences from an assembly
Remove Mitochondrial DNA from an assembly
key_points: Assembly decontamination is important to avoid false identification of genes, blast hits...

workflows.name: Assembly-decontamination-VGP9
workflows.title: Assembly-decontamination-VGP9

report.markdown:
# Workflow Execution Report

### Worflow ran on: 

```galaxy
invocation_time()
```

# List of contaminants


```galaxy
history_dataset_as_table(output="contaminants_table")
```


# List of Mitochondrial scaffolds

```galaxy
history_dataset_as_table(output="mito_scaff_names")
```




## Workflow
```galaxy
workflow_display()
```

history.message: format workflow and update test to the latest version of the workflow
creation of a tutorial for Asssembly decontamination'
